author: kktam
body:
Requesting if current Powershell release has capability of importing custom powershell modules into Linux and OSX, and create documentation on how to do this (as compared to Windows , any similarity or difference).

If this feature is not currently available, is there any plan to include it, in any of the future release?

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
Hi @kktam 

It's exactly the same as on windows: `Import-Module <name>` or `Import-Module <path>`. Did you have problems with import?
It's worth mentioning that not all modules are compatible with linux. It's mostly because of the differences between FullCLR and CoreCLR, but also due to the platform specific things: i.e. case-sensitive file-system, no registry, etc.

title: Import Custom Powershell Modules in Linux and OSX
